title: UI/UX & QoC
text: UI/UX (User Interface / User Experience) & QoC (Quality of Code). These two things are what I'm focusing on when I work as a freelancer.

section.title: Why UI/UX?
section.content: UI/UX design is essential for creating user-friendly digital experiences that all the clients require for the brand loyalty.

section.title: Why QoC?
section.content: Quality of Code is the speed of the development I think. And it will affect the project upgrading and management.
